text: aur hamane pratyek samudaay mein ek rasool bheja ki allaah kee ibaadat (vandana) karo aur taagoot (asur- allaah ke siva poojyon) se bacho, to unamen se kuchh ko, allaah ne supath dikha diya aur kuchh par kupath sidhd ho gaya. to dharatee mein chalo-phiro, phir dekho ki jhuthalaane vaalon ka ant kaisa raha
